actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for additions to reserves for refunds of beverage container deposits.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a wholesale distributor of beverages to deduct a reasonable addition to a reserve fund for refunds of beverage container deposits. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to promulgate regulations which will limit the amount of the deduction allowable for the first year the taxpayer elects such procedure and specify the time and manner for such election. Makes such an election applicable to all subsequent taxable years unless the Secretary consents to a revocation of such election.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for additions to reserves for refunds of beverage container deposits.
